headline: Will ServiceNow’s (NOW) AI-Powered Solutions Lead to Sustained Growth in 2025?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 11 Important AI News and Ratings for Investors. In this article, we are going to take a look at where ServiceNow, Inc.’s (NYSE:NOW) stands against the other AI stocks. The rapid advancements in artificial intelligence have raised both opportunities and concerns, especially regarding its safety and the ethical […]

headline: ServiceNow price target raised to $1,200 from $1,000 at Canaccord
summary: Canaccord raised the firm’s price target on ServiceNow (NOW) to $1,200 from $1,000 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after meeting with management. The key takeaway here was management’s confidence in the durability of the company’s growth, the analyst tells investors in a research note. The firm says ServiceNow shares are expensive, “but it’s probably the best fundamentally positioned in our coverage, so it’s one that you need to own and buy on pullbacks.” Published first on TheFly – the ult
